Home.aboutText: Welcome to Mureș Apartments! We are passionate about providing you with a unique and comfortable stay in Târgu Mureș. Our apartments are carefully designed and equipped to make you feel at home, whether you're here for business or leisure. We believe in offering a personal touch and high-quality service to ensure your visit is memorable. Explore the city's charm from our conveniently located accommodations and experience Romanian hospitality at its best.

TermsAndConditionsPage.title: Terms & Conditions
TermsAndConditionsPage.introductionContent: Welcome to Mureș Apartments. By booking or using our services, you agree to these Terms & Conditions. Please read them carefully.
TermsAndConditionsPage.bookingPaymentContent1: Payment is settled directly with the host in person upon arrival (no advance online payment).
TermsAndConditionsPage.bookingPaymentContent2: Accepted payment methods: Cash or direct bank card transfer (credit/debit).
TermsAndConditionsPage.bookingPaymentContent3: Prices include all mandatory fees (no hidden charges).
TermsAndConditionsPage.cancellationContent1: Free cancellation up to 10 days before check-in.
TermsAndConditionsPage.cancellationContent2: Cancellations within 10 days incur a 50% fee.
TermsAndConditionsPage.cancellationContent3: No-show or same-day cancellations are charged in full.
TermsAndConditionsPage.cancellationContent4: To modify a booking, please contact the host at least 10 days in advance.
TermsAndConditionsPage.checkInCheckOutContent1: Standard check-in: from 3 PM; check-out: by 11 AM.
TermsAndConditionsPage.checkInCheckOutContent2: Early check-in or late check-out may be available on request (subject to availability and fees).
TermsAndConditionsPage.guestResponsibilitiesContent1: You agree to treat the property and its contents with care.
TermsAndConditionsPage.guestResponsibilitiesContent2: No smoking indoors; quiet hours from 10 PM to 8 AM.
TermsAndConditionsPage.guestResponsibilitiesContent3: You are responsible for any damage caused by you or your party.
TermsAndConditionsPage.liabilityContent1: We carry comprehensive property and liability insurance.
TermsAndConditionsPage.liabilityContent2: We are not liable for personal injury, loss, or damage to guests’ belongings beyond what our insurance covers.
TermsAndConditionsPage.governingLawContent1: These terms are governed by Romanian law.
TermsAndConditionsPage.governingLawContent2: Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Mureș County.

CookiePolicyPage.title: Cookie Policy
CookiePolicyPage.whatAreCookiesContent: Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help our website remember your preferences and improve your experience.
CookiePolicyPage.essentialCookies: Essential Cookies: Enable core site functionality (e.g., page navigation, security).
CookiePolicyPage.performanceCookies: Performance Cookies: Collect anonymous data on site usage to help us improve speed and content.
CookiePolicyPage.marketingCookies: Marketing Cookies: (If used) Track referrals and ad performance to show you relevant offers.
CookiePolicyPage.cookieManagementContent1: You can control and delete cookies through your browser settings at any time.
CookiePolicyPage.cookieManagementContent2: Please note that disabling essential cookies may affect site performance.
CookiePolicyPage.thirdPartyCookiesContent: We may allow trusted third parties (e.g., analytics providers) to set cookies on our site. These cookies help us understand how visitors use the site and optimize it accordingly.
CookiePolicyPage.updatesToPolicyContent: We may update our Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted here with a revised “Last Updated” date.

CookieConsent.messageLine1: We use cookies to improve your experience.
